<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">&#147;</FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Yaupi Expansion Project</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">&#148; means the 40MW hydro expansion project at the Yaupi unit of Electroandes, as described in the
Electroandes Information. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 1.02.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Certain Principles of Interpretation</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. In this Agreement, unless otherwise indicated, all words
defined in the singular have the corresponding meaning in the plural and vice versa; words importing any gender include the other gender; references to statutes or regulations are to be construed as including all statutory or regulatory provisions
consolidating, amending or replacing the statute or regulation referred to; references to &#147;writing&#148; include printing, typing, lithography and other means of reproducing words in a tangible visible form; the words &#147;including&#148;,
&#147;includes&#148; and &#147;include&#148; shall be deemed to be followed in each instance by the words &#147;without limitation&#148;; the words &#147;shall&#148; and &#147;will&#148; have the same meaning; references to articles, sections (or
subdivisions of sections), exhibits, annexes or schedules are to articles, sections (or subdivisions of sections), exhibits, annexes or schedules of or to this Agreement; references to agreements and other contractual instruments shall be deemed to
include all subsequent amendments, extensions and other modifications to such instruments (without, however, limiting any prohibition on any such amendments, extensions and other modifications by the terms of this Agreement); and references to
Persons include their respective successors and assigns permitted hereby and, in the case of Governmental or Regulatory Authorities, Persons succeeding to their respective functions and capacities. Except as expressly provided otherwise herein, all
financial and accounting terms and concepts shall be given the connotation and definition dictated by GAAP. </FONT></P>
<P align="center">
<B><FONT face="serif">ARTICLE II </FONT></B><BR>
<BR>
<B><FONT face="serif">SALE OF INTERESTS AND CLOSING</FONT></B><FONT face="serif"> </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 2.01.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Purchase and Sale</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. At the Closing, on the terms and subject to the conditions set forth in this Agreement:</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">Seller will sell to Purchaser, and Purchaser will purchase from Seller, the Interests, by delivering to Purchaser (i) a Bill of Sale
substantially in the form of Exhibit B, (ii) ownership certificates evidencing 100% of the capital stock of TEC and the PSEG Americas Stake, duly endorsed in blank, or accompanied by stock powers duly executed in blank, and (iii) such other
documents or certificates that may be required under applicable Law to transfer the record and beneficial ownership of the Interests to Purchaser; and </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">Purchaser shall transfer the Purchase Price (as calculated and adjusted pursuant to Sections 2.04 and 2.05), less any Capital Gain Tax
pursuant to Section 2.07, to Seller by wire transfer of immediately available funds in U.S. Dollars to such account as Seller may direct by written notice delivered to Purchaser. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 2.02.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Purchase Price</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. The purchase price for the Interests (the &#147;Purchase Price&#148;) shall be
calculated pursuant to Section 2.04(d) and may be adjusted pursuant to Section 2.05.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 2.03.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Closing</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. The Closing will take place at the offices of Shearman &amp; Sterling LLP, special
counsel to Seller, at 599 Lexington Avenue, New York, New York </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">10022, at 10:00 A.M. Eastern time, on the Closing Date. On the Closing Date, the parties will cause the transactions described in Section 2.01 to occur and will, as applicable, cause to be delivered the other documents and
instruments to be delivered under Articles VII and VIII, and Seller shall deliver to Purchaser originals (if available) or true, correct and complete copies of all books and records of Electroandes and TEC that are in the Possession of Seller (or
cause Electroandes and TEC or their respective counsel or accountants to deliver to Purchaser, as promptly as practicable following the Closing, any of the foregoing items that are not delivered to Purchaser at the Closing). </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 2.04.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Enterprise Value; Calculation of Purchase Price</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Not later than two Business Days before the Closing Date, Seller shall deliver to Purchaser (A) an unaudited statement setting forth the
Estimated Working Capital; (B) an unaudited statement setting forth the Estimated Capex; and (C) an unaudited statement setting forth the Estimated Debt.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">If the Estimated Working Capital exceeds Notional Working Capital by more than the Designated Amount, then the Enterprise Value shall be
increased by the amount that Estimated Working Capital exceeds Notional Working Capital. If Notional Working Capital exceeds Estimated Working Capital by more than the Designated Amount, then the Enterprise Value shall be reduced by the amount that
Notional Working Capital Exceeds Estimated Working Capital. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(c)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Enterprise Value shall be increased by the amount of the Estimated Capex. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">The Purchase Price to be paid at Closing shall be an amount equal to the Enterprise Value (as adjusted pursuant to Section 2.04(b) and (c) above), less the Estimated Debt.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 2.05.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Post-Closing Adjustment to Purchase Price</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As promptly as practicable following the Closing Date but no later than 90 days after the Closing Date, Purchaser shall prepare and deliver
to Seller (i) a statement setting forth a calculation of Closing Working Capital (the &#147;Closing Working Capital Statement&#148;); (ii) a statement, prepared in accordance with GAAP applied on a basis consistent with Electroandes&#146; past
practices, setting forth a calculation of the Closing Capital Expenditures (the &#147;Closing Capex Statement&#148;); (iii) a statement, prepared in accordance with GAAP applied on a basis consistent with Electroandes&#146; past practices, setting
forth a calculation of the Closing Debt (the &#147;Closing Debt Statement&#148; and, together with the Closing Working Capital Statement and the Closing Capex Statement, the &#147;Closing Statements&#148;); and (iv) a report of Purchaser&#146;s
accountants, stating that the Closing Statements fairly present the Closing Working Capital, the Closing Capex and the Closing Debt in accordance with Exhibit A or in accordance with GAAP applied on a basis consistent with Electroandes&#146; past
practices, as applicable.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">If Seller objects to any component of the Closing Working Capital Statement, the Closing Capex Statement or the Closing Debt Statement,
then Seller must notify Purchaser in writing of its objection on or before the 30th day after Purchaser&#146;s delivery to Seller</FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">of the Closing Statements. If Seller does so object, and if Seller and Purchaser have not agreed on a resolution of those objections, then at any time after the 30th day following the delivery of Seller&#146;s notice of objection,
either Seller or Purchaser may submit all items in dispute for resolution to an independent accounting firm of international reputation mutually acceptable to Seller and Purchaser (the &#147;Independent Accounting Firm&#148;), with the cost of such
review and resolution to be shared one-half by Purchaser and one-half by Seller, and the results thereof shall (absent manifest error) be final and binding. In the event that the Independent Accounting Firm refuses to accept the appointment provided
hereunder, either party may petition the International Chamber of Commerce to appoint a suitable and comparable replacement for such Independent Accounting Firm, with the cost of such appointment to be borne one-half by Purchaser and one-half by
Seller. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(c)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">The Closing Statements shall be deemed final and binding for purposes of this Section 2.05 upon the earliest of (i) the 31</FONT><SUP><FONT face="serif">st</FONT></SUP><FONT face="serif"> day after Purchaser&#146;s delivery to Seller of the Closing Statements, provided that Seller failed to notify Purchaser of a dispute with respect to either Closing Statement within the time period
specified in Section 2.05(b), (ii) the date on which Seller and Purchaser have resolved all disputes with respect to the Closing Statements in accordance with Section 2.05(b), and (iii) the date on which the Independent Accounting Firm or its
replacement, as applicable, has completed its review and resolution of any disputed items on the Closing Statements in accordance with Section 2.05(b) and has provided to Seller and Purchaser a detailed summary of such review and resolution (the
earliest of (i), (ii) and (iii) of this Section 2.05(c) being, the &#147;Settlement Date&#148;). </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(d)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">If Closing Working Capital set forth on the Final Closing Working Capital Statement exceeds Estimated Working Capital by more than the
Designated Amount, then the Purchase Price shall be adjusted upward in an amount equal to the excess of such Closing Working Capital over Estimated Working Capital and Purchaser shall pay the amount of such excess to Seller by wire transfer in
immediately available funds on or before the fifth Business Day following the Settlement Date. If Estimated Working Capital exceeds Closing Working Capital set forth on the Final Closing Working Capital Statement by more than the Designated Amount,
then the Purchase Price shall be adjusted downward in an amount equal to the excess of Estimated Working Capital over such Closing Working Capital and Seller shall pay the amount of such excess to Purchaser by wire transfer in immediately available
funds on or before the fifth Business Day following the Settlement Date. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(e)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If Closing Capex set forth on the Final Closing Capex Statement exceeds Estimated Capex, then the Purchase Price shall be adjusted upward
in an amount equal to such excess and Purchaser shall pay the amount of such excess to Seller by wire transfer in immediately available funds on or before the fifth Business Day following the Settlement Date. If Estimated Capex exceeds Closing Capex
set forth on the Final Closing Capex Statement, then the Purchase Price shall be adjusted downward in an amount equal to such excess and Seller shall pay the amount of such excess to Purchaser by wire transfer in immediately available funds on or
before the fifth Business Day following the Settlement Date. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(f)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If Closing Debt set forth on the Final Closing Debt Statement exceeds Estimated Debt, then the Purchase Price shall be adjusted downward in
an amount equal to such excess and Seller shall pay the amount of such excess to Purchaser by wire transfer in </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">immediately available funds on or before the fifth Business Day following the Settlement Date. If Estimated Debt exceeds Closing Debt set forth on the Final Closing Debt Statement, then the Purchase Price shall be adjusted upward
in an amount equal to such excess and Purchaser shall pay the amount of such excess to Seller by wire transfer in immediately available funds on or before the fifth Business Day following the Settlement Date.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 2.06.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">No Dissolution of AenP</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Neither the execution and delivery of this Agreement nor the
consummation of any transaction contemplated herein is intended to cause a dissolution of AenP. Purchaser hereby acknowledges that, from and after the Closing, except as provided in Section 9.11, Seller shall have no, and is hereby released from
any, obligations to AenP. Any amendments or modifications of the agreements concerning AenP or other Governmental or Regulatory Approvals of any country required or desirable to reflect new ownership of AenP, subsequent to but not including the
closing of the transactions contemplated hereby, shall be the responsibility of Purchaser. Upon Closing, Purchaser shall purchase Seller&#146;s interest in the AenP and assume Seller&#146;s rights and obligations as an &#147;Asociante&#148; of the
AenP, which shall be effected by Seller&#146;s assignment of all of Seller&#146;s right, title and interest in and to the AenP Agreement and AenP to Purchaser in the form of Exhibit C (the &#147;AenP Transfer of Interest to Purchaser&#148;).
</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 2.07.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Capital Gain Tax</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. The Seller shall apply on a timely basis for a certification from SUNAT
regarding the Tax basis with respect to the PSEG Americas Stake. The Purchase Price shall be paid in accordance with Section 2.01 less any applicable Taxes owing to SUNAT with respect to any capital gain realized in connection with the sale of the
PSEG Americas Stake (the &#147;Capital Gain Tax&#148;), and Seller shall prepare a Tax Return with respect to such Capital Gain Tax (the &#147;Capital Gain Tax Return&#148;). If Purchaser is domiciled in Peru, on the Closing Date, Purchaser shall be
responsible for the filing of the Capital Gain Tax Return and for the payment to SUNAT of any such Capital Gain Tax. If Purchaser is not domiciled in Peru, on the Closing Date, Electroandes shall cause Seller to file the Capital Gain Tax Return and
to provide payment to SUNAT in the amount of such Capital Gain Tax. In the event the Purchase Price is adjusted in accordance with Section 2.05 or Section 9.17(a), the parties shall cause to be filed an amended Tax Return with respect to the Capital
Gain Tax and shall reimburse each other as appropriate for any overpayment or underpayment of Capital Gain Tax as of the Closing.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 2.08.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Further Assurances; Post-Closing Cooperation; Updating</FONT></U></P>
<P align="left">
<U><FONT face="serif">Schedules</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, on the Closing Date or at any time or from time to time after the Closing, each of
the parties hereto shall execute and deliver such other documents and instruments, provide such materials and information and take such other actions as may reasonably be necessary, proper or advisable, to fulfill its obligations under this
Agreement. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Following the Closing, each party will afford each other party, its counsel and its accountants, during normal business hours, cooperation
and reasonable access to the books, records and other data relating to the business or financial or operating condition of TEC and Electroandes in its possession with respect to periods prior to the Closing Date and the right </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">to make copies and extracts therefrom, to the extent that such cooperation and access may be reasonably required by the requesting party in connection with: </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">compliance with the requirements of any Governmental or Regulatory Authority of any country (other than a Taxing authority which is the
subject of Section 9.15); or </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(ii)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any
actual or threatened Action or Proceeding in any country. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(c)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">Each party agrees for a period extending until the expiration of all applicable statutes of limitations not to destroy or otherwise dispose
of any books, records or other data referred to in clause (b) above. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(d)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">Prior to Closing, Seller may supplement or otherwise amend the Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule, including by the addition of new sections
to the Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule (the Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule, as so supplemented or otherwise amended and any such new sections being collectively referred to herein as the &#147;Updated Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule&#148;),
with respect to any matters arising after the date hereof, which, if existing as of the date hereof, would have been set forth in the Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule. Notwithstanding the foregoing, no Updated Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule
shall be deemed to have cured any breach of any representation or warranty made by Seller as of the date of this Agreement unless Purchaser otherwise consents in writing. Seller agrees to advise Purchaser promptly in writing of any matter or
occurrence that, to the Knowledge of Seller, may constitute a breach by either party of any representation, warranty or covenant contained in this Agreement, and Purchaser agrees to advise Seller promptly in writing of any matter or occurrence that,
to Purchaser&#146;s actual knowledge, may constitute a breach by either party of any representation, warranty or covenant contained in this Agreement. Upon the Closing, all matters disclosed by Seller in any Updated Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule
prior to the Closing shall be deemed to be matters of which Purchaser had actual knowledge for purposes of Sections 9.01 and 9.06(b)(v) .</FONT></P>
<P align="center">
<B><FONT face="serif">ARTICLE III </FONT></B><BR>
<BR>
<B><FONT face="serif">REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF SELLER</FONT></B><FONT face="serif"> </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Seller hereby represents and warrants to Purchaser as follows. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.01.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Legal Existence</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"></FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <font face="serif"></font>Seller is a company duly formed, validly existing and in good standing under the laws of Bermuda. Seller is qualified to do business and is
in good standing where the conduct of its business or locations of its Properties makes such qualification necessary, except where failure to be so qualified or to be in good standing would not reasonably be expected to have an Electroandes Material
Adverse Effect or a material adverse effect on Seller&#146;s ability to sell Interests. Seller has all requisite power and authority to execute and deliver, and to perform its obligations under, this Agreement and to sell the Interests pursuant to
this Agreement. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">TEC is a company duly formed, validly existing and in good standing under the laws of the Cayman Islands and has full power and authority
to conduct its business as </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">currently conducted and to own and operate all of its assets. TEC is qualified to do business and is in good standing where the conduct of its business or locations of its Properties makes such qualification necessary. Except with
respect to its Investment Stability Agreement, its ownership of the TEC Stake and as set forth in Section 3.01(b) of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule, TEC has no assets or liabilities. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.02.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Authority</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The execution and delivery by Seller of, and the performance of its obligations under, and the consummation by it of the transactions
contemplated by, this Agreement have been duly authorized by all necessary action on the part of Seller, and no other actions or proceedings on the part of Seller are necessary to authorize the execution of this Agreement, the performance of its
obligations hereunder and the consummation by it of the transactions contemplated hereunder except as noted in this Agreement. This Agreement has been duly and validly executed and delivered by Seller and constitutes the legal, valid and binding
obligation of Seller, enforceable against it in accordance with its terms, except as the same may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium and other similar laws of general application affecting the rights and remedies of
creditors and general principles of equity (regardless of whether such enforcement is considered in a proceeding in equity or at law). </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">The execution and delivery by TEC of, and the performance of its obligations under, and the consummation by it of the transactions
contemplated by, this Agreement have been duly authorized by all necessary action on the part of TEC, and no other actions or proceedings on the part of TEC are necessary to authorize the execution of this Agreement, the performance of its
obligations hereunder and the consummation by it of the transactions contemplated hereunder except as noted in this Agreement. This Agreement has been duly and validly executed and delivered by TEC and constitutes the legal, valid and binding
obligation of TEC, enforceable against it in accordance with its terms, except as the same may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium and other similar laws of general application affecting the rights and remedies of
creditors and general principles of equity (regardless of whether such enforcement is considered in a proceeding in equity or at law). </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.03.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">No Conflicts</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as set forth in Section 3.03 of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule, the execution and delivery by Seller of, and the performance by
it of its obligations under, and the consummation by it of the transactions contemplated by, this Agreement will not: </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">result in a violation or breach of any of the terms, conditions or provisions of the organic documents of Seller, TEC, or Electroandes;
</FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(ii)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">assuming all Seller Approvals have been obtained, result in a material violation or breach of any term or provision of any Governmental or
Regulatory Rule or Governmental or Regulatory Approval applicable to Seller or Electroandes or any of their respective Properties (other than such conflicts, </FONT></P>

<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
<FONT face="serif">violations or breaches as would occur solely as a result of the identity or the legal or regulatory status of Purchaser or any of its Affiliates); </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">

applicable to TEC or any of its Properties (other than such conflicts, violations or breaches as would occur solely as a result of the identity or the legal or regulatory status of Purchaser or any of its Affiliates); </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(iv)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;except
as would not reasonably be expected to have an Electroandes Material Adverse
Effect or would not reasonably be expected to affect  adversely the ability of
Seller to consummate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement or to perform
its obligations hereunder, conflict with or result in a violation or breach of
or constitute (with or without notice, lapse of time or both)  a default under
or except as has been taken or done, require Seller or Electroandes to obtain
any consent, approval or action of, make any filing with or give any notice to

any right of termination, consent, cancellation, acceleration or modification

contemplated by, this Agreement will not: </FONT></P>

Electroandes in connection with the execution, delivery and performance by Seller of this Agreement or the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereby, except where the failure to obtain any such Governmental or Regulatory Approval of the
Governmental Authority of any country would not reasonably be expected to affect adversely the ability of Seller to consummate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement or to perform its obligations hereunder or would be reasonably expected to
have an Electroandes Material Adverse Effect, and except as would be required solely as a result of the identity or the legal or regulatory status of Purchaser or its Affiliates. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No Governmental or Regulatory Approval of any Governmental Authority is required on the part of TEC in connection with the execution,
delivery and performance by TEC of this Agreement or the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereby, except as would be required solely as a result of the identity or the legal or regulatory status of Purchaser or its Affiliates.
</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.05.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Capitalization</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">Electroandes is a sociedad an&oacute;nima duly formed, validly existing and in good standing under the laws of Peru and has the power and
authority to own, lease and operate its Properties and to conduct its business as currently conducted. Electroandes is qualified to transact business and is in good standing in each jurisdiction which the Properties owned, leased or operated by it
or the nature of the business conducted by it makes such qualification necessary, except where the failure to so qualify or be in good standing would not reasonably be expected to have an Electroandes Material Adverse Effect. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Immediately prior to and on the Closing Date: </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">the share capital of Electroandes is represented by 547,181,661 common shares of S/.1.00 nominal value;</FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(ii)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">Seller is the beneficial and record owner of 100% of the issued and outstanding capital stock of TEC, all of which shares are fully paid
and non assessable; </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(iii)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">TEC
is the beneficial and record owner of 79.59% of the capital stock of Electroandes,
all of which shares are fully paid and non  assessable </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(iv)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Seller is the beneficial and record owner of 20.40% of the issued and outstanding capital stock of Electroandes, all of which shares are
fully paid and non assessable; and </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(v)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">the TEC Stake and the PSEG Americas Stake represent 99.99% of the equity interests in Electroandes. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">Except as set forth in Section 3.05(c) of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule, there are no other interests in Electroandes or outstanding
Options issued or granted by, or binding upon, either Seller, TEC or Electroandes for any Person to purchase or sell or otherwise acquire or dispose of any equity interest in Electroandes or TEC, other than Purchaser&#146;s rights under this
Agreement. Except as set forth in Section 3.05(c) of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule, none of the Interests are subject to any voting trust or voting trust agreement, voting agreement, pledge agreement, buy-sell agreement, right of first refusal,
preemptive right or proxy. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 3.06 <u>Legal Proceedings</u>. </P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as set forth in Section 3.06 of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule, there are no Actions or Proceedings pending in any country or, to
the Knowledge of Seller, threatened in writing against Seller or Electroandes in any country that would reasonably be expected to: </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(i)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;result in the issuance of a Governmental or Regulatory Rule of any Governmental Authority of any country restraining, enjoining or
otherwise prohibiting or making illegal the sale of the Interests by Seller under this Agreement or the performance by Seller of its obligations under this Agreement; or </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">individually
or in the aggregate with any other Actions or Proceedings not noted above, reasonably
be expected to have an Electroandes  Material Adverse Effect. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;There are no Actions or Proceedings pending in any country or threatened in writing against TEC in any country.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.07.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Title to Property</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Seller has good and marketable title to the Interests and TEC has good and marketable title to the TEC Stake, in each case, free and clear
of all Liens. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Electroandes owns, or possesses adequate licenses or other valid rights to use all software, technology, real property and public
concessions pursuant to the Privatization </FONT></P>

<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">Agreement or otherwise, in each case that are material and used in the conduct of its business as presently conducted, but excluding any of the foregoing as such relate to any projects in development and not yet in operation.
</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 3.08.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Electroandes Contracts</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. </FONT></P>

outstanding obligations under any Contract to which it is no longer a party. </FONT></P>

<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.09.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Taxes</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. (a) Except as set forth in Section 3.09 of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule, to the

are true, correct and complete in all material respects; </FONT></P>

between the Takeover Date and the date hereof have been  timely paid; and </FONT></P>

are no material audits, claims, assessments, deficiencies, levies, administrative
or judicial proceedings pending or threatened or  proposed in writing against
Electroandes by any Governmental or Regulatory Authority. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as set forth in Section 3.09 of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule: </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(i)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all material Tax Returns required to be filed by TEC and AenP have been timely filed and all such Tax Returns are true, correct and
complete in all material respects; </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(ii)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all
material Taxes of, or payable by, TEC and AenP that have become due and owing
through the date hereof have been timely paid; and
</FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(iii)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;there
are no material audits, claims, assessments, deficiencies, levies, administrative
or judicial proceedings pending or, to the  Knowledge of Seller threatened or
proposed in writing against TEC and AenP by any Governmental or Regulatory Authority
of the Cayman Islands or Peru. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.10.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Employee Matters</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Neither AenP nor TEC has any employees. Any Contracts of Electroandes which
expressly provide any employee of Electroandes with any special right or entitlement upon the disposition of any of Seller&#146;s beneficial interests in Electroandes are listed in Section 3.10 of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule. Except as
disclosed in Section 3.10 of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule, (i) Electroandes is in compliance in all material respects with all applicable employment Laws and practices, (ii) no labor strike or similar dispute exists or, to the Knowledge of
Seller, is threatened with respect to Electroandes. To the Knowledge of Seller, to the extent that any person would be deemed to be providing any core functions to Electroandes in connection with third party contractor arrangements, such person
would not be deemed to be an employee of Electroandes under applicable Law. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.11.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Insurance</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. To the Knowledge of Seller, Electroandes has insurance policies currently in effect
that are sufficient to insure the business, operations, employees and Properties of Electroandes in a manner consistent with the practices of similarly situated hydroelectric generating companies in Peru. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.12.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Environmental Matters</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Except as set forth in Section 3.12 of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule,
to the Knowledge of Seller: </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Electroandes complies and has complied since the Takeover Date with Environmental Laws, except for such non-compliance that would not
reasonably be expected to have an Electroandes Material Adverse Effect; and </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Electroandes possesses and complies and has complied in all material respects with all Governmental and Regulatory Approvals required under
any Environmental Law for its operations as currently operated and all such Governmental and Regulatory Approvals of the Governmental Authorities of Peru are in full force and effect. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.13.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Financial Statements and Condition</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to the execution of this Agreement, Seller has delivered to Purchaser true and complete copies of the Electroandes Financial
Statements. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Audited Financial Statements are true, complete and accurate. The Electroandes Financial Statements (i) fairly present in all material
respects the financial condition and results of operations of Electroandes as of the respective dates thereof and for the respective periods covered thereby subject to, in the case of the Interim Financial Statements, normal year end adjustments and
the absence of notes, and (ii) were prepared in accordance with GAAP applied on a basis consistent with the past practices of the Electroandes.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.14.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">No Material Adverse Effect</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Since December 31, 2006, there has not occurred any circumstance,
development, or event or series of such occurrences that, has had or would reasonably be expected to have, individually or in the aggregate, an Electroandes Material Adverse Effect. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 3.15.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Compliance with Laws.</FONT></U><FONT face="serif"> </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Electroandes is in compliance with all Laws, Orders, Governmental or Regulatory Rules, Governmental or Regulatory Approvals applicable to
it, except where any such non-compliance would not reasonably be expected to have an Electroandes Material Adverse Effect. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;TEC is in compliance with all Laws, Orders, Governmental or Regulatory Rules, Governmental or Regulatory Approvals applicable to it.
</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.16.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Brokers</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Neither AenP, TEC nor Electroandes has any liability or obligation to pay fees or
commissions to any broker, finder or agent with respect to the transactions contemplated by this Agreement. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 3.17.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Disclosure Documents</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. To the Knowledge of Seller and except as would not reasonably be expected
to have an Electroandes Material Adverse Effect, all written filings made by Electroandes after the Takeover Date with any Governmental or Regulatory Authority of Peru are true and complete in all material respects as of the dates of filing.
</FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="center">
<B><FONT face="serif">ARTICLE IV </FONT></B><BR>
<BR>
<B><FONT face="serif">REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF PURCHASER</FONT></B><FONT face="serif"> </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Purchaser hereby represents and warrants to Seller as set forth below. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 4.01.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Legal Existence</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Purchaser is a company duly formed, validly existing and in good standing under
the laws of Peru. Purchaser is qualified to do business where the conduct of its business or locations of its Properties makes such qualification necessary, except where failure to be so qualified or to be in good standing would not have a material
adverse effect on its ability to perform its obligations hereunder. Purchaser has all requisite power and authority to execute and deliver, and to perform its obligations under, this Agreement and to purchase the Interests pursuant to this
Agreement. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 4.02.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Authority</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. The execution and delivery by Purchaser of, and the performance by Purchaser of its
obligations under, this Agreement and the consummation by Purchaser of the transactions contemplated herein have been duly authorized by all necessary action on the part of Purchaser, and no other actions or proceedings on the part of Purchaser are
necessary to authorize this Agreement, the performance of Purchaser&#146;s obligations hereunder and the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereunder. This Agreement has been duly and validly executed and delivered by Purchaser and
constitutes the legal, valid and binding obligations of Purchaser, enforceable against Purchaser, in accordance with its terms, except as the same may be limited by (a) bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium and other similar Laws of
general application affecting the rights and remedies of creditors and (b) general principles of equity (regardless of whether such enforcement is considered in a proceeding in equity or at law). </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 4.03.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">No Conflicts</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. The execution and delivery by Purchaser of, and the performance by it of its
obligations under, this Agreement and the consummation of the transactions contemplated herein will not: </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;result in a violation or breach of any of the terms, conditions or provisions of the organic documents of Purchaser; </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;result in a violation or breach of any term or provision of any Governmental or Regulatory Rule or Governmental or Regulatory Approval of
the Governmental Authorities of any country applicable to Purchaser or any of its Properties; or </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(c)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;except as would not adversely affect the ability of Purchaser to consummate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement or to perform
its obligations hereunder, conflict with or result in a violation or breach of or constitute (with or without notice, lapse of time or both) a default under or require Purchaser to obtain any consent, approval or action of, make any filing with or
give any notice to any Person as a result or under the terms of, any Contract or Governmental or Regulatory Approval of the Governmental Authorities of any country to which Purchaser is a party or by which any of its Properties is bound. </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 4.04.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Governmental or Regulatory Approvals</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Except as set forth in Schedule B attached hereto, no
Governmental or Regulatory Approval of the Governmental Authorities of any country is required on the part of Purchaser or its Affiliates in connection with the execution and delivery by it or its Affiliates of, and the performance by it or its
Affiliates of its obligations under, this Agreement or the transactions contemplated herein other than those that have been obtained or made. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 4.05.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Legal Proceedings</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. There are no Actions or Proceedings of the Governmental Authorities of any
country pending or, to the knowledge of Purchaser, threatened against Purchaser or any of its Properties that would result in the issuance of a Governmental or Regulatory Rule of any Governmental Authority of any country restraining, enjoining or
otherwise prohibiting or making illegal the purchase by Purchaser of the Interests under this Agreement or the performance by Purchaser of its obligations under this Agreement. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 4.06.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Investment Representations</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Purchaser is an investor experienced in evaluating investments in
power generation facilities and has the knowledge, experience and resources to enable it to evaluate and to bear the risks of the investment in the Interests. Purchaser understands that the sale of the Interests under this Agreement will not be
registered or qualified under any securities law. The Interests are being acquired by Purchaser for its own account for the purpose of investment and not with a view to distribution in violation of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or any
applicable securities laws. Purchaser will refrain from transferring or otherwise disposing of the Interests in such manner as to cause Seller to be in violation of the registration requirements of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or any
other securities law. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 4.07.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Brokers</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. All negotiations relating to this Agreement and the purchase of the Interests under
this Agreement have been carried out by Purchaser directly with Seller without the intervention of any Person on behalf of Purchaser in such manner as to give rise to any valid claim by any Person against Seller for a finder&#146;s fee, brokerage
commission or similar payment. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 4.08.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Due Diligence Investigation</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Purchaser, its agents and its Representatives, have had the
opportunity to conduct all such due diligence investigation of Electroandes and its Properties as they deemed necessary or advisable in connection with entering into this Agreement and the related documents and the transactions contemplated hereby
and thereby. In entering into this Agreement, Purchaser has not relied and is not relying on any opinions, promises, evaluations, maintenance reports, forecasts or forward looking financing statements of Seller or any of its Representatives
whatsoever whether written or oral. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 4.09.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Financing</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Purchaser Parent has, and Purchaser has access to, sufficient immediately available
funds to pay, in cash, the Purchase Price and all other amounts payable pursuant to this Agreement or otherwise necessary to consummate all the transactions contemplated hereby (the &#147;Necessary Funds&#148;).</FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="center">
<B><FONT face="serif">ARTICLE V </FONT></B><BR>
<BR>
<B><FONT face="serif">COVENANTS OF SELLER</FONT></B><FONT face="serif"> </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 5.01.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Investigation by Purchaser</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Until the Closing Date, Seller will, and will cause Electroandes and
TEC to provide Purchaser and its Representatives with reasonable access, upon reasonable prior notice and during normal business hours, to all officers, employees, agents and accountants of Electroandes and TEC and their respective Properties and
books and records, but only to the extent that such access does not unreasonably interfere with the business and operations of Electroandes or compromise Electroandes&#146; (i) ability to maintain the confidential status of Electroandes&#146;
communications with its attorneys and accountants or (ii) defense, prior to Closing, of the SUNAT Deductibility Proceeding or any SUNAT Follow-On Dispute. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 5.02.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Conduct of Business</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Subject to Section 5.03 below, until the Closing Date, Seller shall cause
TEC and Electroandes to conduct their business in material compliance with Good Utility Practices and all Governmental or Regulatory Rules and Governmental or Regulatory Approvals of the Governmental Authorities of any country applicable to them and
any of their Properties. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 5.03.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Certain Restrictions</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Until the Closing, Seller will cause TEC not to engage in any business
other than that necessary in connection with owning the TEC Stake and Seller will cause Electroandes to refrain from taking any of the following actions without Purchaser&#146;s written consent (which shall not be unreasonably withheld): </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;amending its organic documents in any material respect or taking any action with respect to any recapitalization, reorganization,
liquidation, dissolution or winding up of Electroandes; </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;acquiring or exchanging any Properties except to the extent that such Properties are acquired or exchanged: </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">in the ordinary course of business and are not in excess in value of &#36;500,000 individually or &#36;1,000,000 in the aggregate; or
</FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(ii)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;as expressly contemplated by this Agreement or in connection with any capital investment project noted in the Electroandes Information,
including the Yaupi Expansion Project; </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">provided</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">, </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">however</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">, that Electroandes shall not, without Purchaser&#146;s prior written
consent (which shall not be unreasonably withheld), enter into any Contract in connection with the Yaupi Expansion Project reasonably expected to require aggregate Capital Expenditures in excess of &#36;30,000,000; </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(c)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;disposing of any Properties except to the extent that such Properties are disposed of: </FONT></P>
<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(i)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT face="serif">in the ordinary course of business and are not in excess in value of &#36;1,000,000 individually or &#36;2,500,000 in the aggregate; or</FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left" style="margin-left:25px;">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">as expressly contemplated by this Agreement;</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(d)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;amending, modifying or terminating any Electroandes Contract except in a manner that would not have an Electroandes Material Adverse
Effect; </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(e)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;incurring any Indebtedness other than in the ordinary course of business; </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">provided</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">, </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">however</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">, that in no case shall there be any incurrence of Indebtedness in an aggregate principal amount exceeding &#36;5,000,000 (net of any amounts of Indebtedness discharged
during such period); </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(f)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;forgiving or canceling any debts, or waiving or settling or filing any claims or rights, having a value in the aggregate in excess of
&#36;100,000; or </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(g)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;agreeing
or committing to do or engage in any of the foregoing.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 5.04.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Governmental or Regulatory Approvals</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Prior to the Closing Date, Seller shall use commercially
reasonable efforts to obtain and maintain in full force and effect all Seller Approvals and to consummate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 5.05.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Fulfillment of Conditions</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Seller shall execute and deliver at the Closing each document or instrument that it is required to execute and deliver as a condition to
the Closing under this Agreement. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Seller shall take all commercially reasonable steps necessary or desirable and proceed diligently and in good faith to satisfy each
condition to the obligations of Seller contained in this Agreement and shall not, and shall not permit any of its Affiliates to, take or fail to take any action that would reasonably be expected to result in the non fulfillment of any such
condition. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 5.06.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Further Assurances</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Prior to the Closing Date, Seller shall use its commercially reasonable
efforts to execute and deliver, or cause to be executed and delivered, all such documents and instruments and shall take, or cause to be taken, all such further or other actions as may be necessary to consummate the transactions contemplated by this
Agreement, including such actions at its expense as are necessary in connection with obtaining any third party consents and Seller Approvals, and, prior to the Closing Date, Seller shall cooperate with Purchaser and provide any information regarding
Seller available to Seller reasonably necessary to assist Purchaser in making any filings or applications with any such Governmental or Regulatory Authority. </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="center">
<B><FONT face="serif">ARTICLE VI </FONT></B></P>
<P align="center">
<B><FONT face="serif">COVENANTS OF PURCHASER</FONT></B><FONT face="serif"> </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 6.01.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Governmental or Regulatory Approvals</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to Section 6.01(b), prior to the Closing Date, Purchaser shall obtain and maintain in full force and effect all Governmental or
Regulatory Approvals of the Governmental Authorities of any country necessary to permit Purchaser to perform its obligations under this Agreement and to consummate the transactions contemplated herein. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If Purchaser determines in good faith that it is necessary or if reasonably requested by Seller, Purchaser shall make an appropriate filing
with INDECOPI with respect to the transactions contemplated by this Agreement within 10 Business Days of the date of such determination or request, as applicable. If Purchaser makes such a filing, then Purchaser shall (i) submit as promptly as
practicable to INDECOPI any additional information and documentary material that may be requested pursuant to any Antitrust Law; </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">provided</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">, </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">however</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">, that Purchaser shall provide to Seller a specific list of the items of Evaluation Material that Purchaser proposes to furnish to INDECOPI reasonably in advance of such submission, which items shall
be subject to the approval of the Seller (such approval not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed), (ii) apply for and utilize all measures that may be available under INDECOPI&#146;s procedures or otherwise for INDECOPI to maintain the
confidentiality of any Evaluation Material so submitted to INDECOPI, (iii) limit the Evaluation Material so disclosed to only that necessary for the application, and (iv) promptly furnish Seller with copies of all correspondence, filings and written
communications, and promptly notify Seller with respect to all non-written communications and requests, between Purchaser or any of its Affiliates, on the one hand, and INDECOPI, on the other hand, with respect to this Agreement and the transactions
contemplated hereby. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 6.02.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Fulfillment of Conditions</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(a)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Purchaser shall execute and deliver at the Closing each document that it is required to execute and deliver as a condition to the Closing
under this Agreement. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">(b)</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><FONT face="serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Purchaser shall take all commercially reasonable steps necessary or desirable and proceed diligently and in good faith to satisfy each
condition to the obligations of Purchaser contained in this Agreement and shall not, and shall not permit any of its Affiliates to, take or fail to take any action that would reasonably be expected to result in the non fulfillment of any such
condition.</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 6.03.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Further Assurances</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Subject to the provisions of Section 6.01(b), prior to the Closing Date,
Purchaser shall use its commercially reasonable efforts to execute and deliver, or cause to be executed and delivered, all such documents and instruments and shall take, or cause to be taken, all such further or other actions as may be necessary to
consummate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, including such actions at its </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
<FONT face="serif">expense as are necessary in connection with obtaining any third party consents and all requisite Governmental or Regulatory Approvals of any Governmental Authority of any country, and, prior to the Closing Date, Purchaser shall
cooperate with Seller and provide any information regarding Purchaser and its Affiliates necessary to assist Seller in making any filings or applications with any Governmental or Regulatory Authority. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 6.04.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Source of Funds</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Within 5 Business Days after any date Seller so requests, Purchaser shall, if
so requested by Seller, provide Seller with information regarding its source of funds in further detail so that Seller can determine whether such funds (a) represent property in which a party listed on any of the Government Lists owns an interest or
(b) are the proceeds or any activity deemed unlawful under any Law of any Governmental Authority of the United States, Bermuda, the Cayman Islands or Peru (in either such case, a &#147;Funding Violation&#148;). </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 6.05.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">No Trading</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Purchaser agrees that neither it nor any of its Affiliates shall buy, sell, or
engage in any transaction relating to the Indebtedness of Electroandes before Closing. </FONT></P>
<P align="center">
<B><FONT face="serif">ARTICLE VII </FONT></B><BR>
<BR>
<B><FONT face="serif">CONDITIONS TO OBLIGATIONS OF PURCHASER</FONT></B><FONT face="serif"> </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">The obligation of Purchaser to consummate the transactions described in Section 2.01 are subject to the fulfillment, at or before the Closing, of each of the following conditions (all or any of which
may be waived in writing, in whole or in part by Purchaser in its sole discretion): </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 7.01.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Representations and Warranties</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. The representations and warranties of Seller contained in this
Agreement shall be true and correct in all material respects as of the earlier of the Closing Date and, if Purchaser requires approval under any Antitrust Law or otherwise from any Governmental or Regulatory Authority, October 17, 2007 (such earlier
date being, the &#147;Bringdown Date&#148;) (other than those representations and warranties qualified by materiality or &#147;Electroandes Material Adverse Effect&#148;, which shall be true and correct in all respects as of the Bringdown Date), as
though such representations and warranties were made on and as of the Bringdown Date, except to the extent such representations and warranties expressly relate to an earlier date (in which case as of such earlier date). Notwithstanding anything
contained in this Agreement to the contrary, other than with respect to representations and warranties contained in Sections 3.01, 3.02, 3.03, 3.04 and 3.05, no condition involving the accuracy of representations and warranties made by Seller as of
the date of this Agreement or the Bringdown Date or any other date or period shall be deemed not fulfilled, and Purchaser shall not be entitled to fail to consummate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement or terminate this Agreement on such
basis, if the respects in which such representations and warranties are untrue, would not, individually or in the aggregate, have or reasonably be expected to have an Electroandes Material Adverse Effect. </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 7.02.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Performance</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Seller shall have performed and complied in all material respects with the
agreements, covenants and obligations required by this Agreement to be so performed or complied with by Seller at or before the Closing. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 7.03.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Certificates and Documents</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Seller shall have delivered to Purchaser a (i) certificate, dated
the Closing Date and executed in the name and on behalf of Seller, substantially in the form and to the effect of Exhibit D and (ii) the certificates described in Section 2.01(a)(ii), and (iii) the executed AenP Transfer of Interest to Purchaser.
</FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 7.04.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Orders and Laws</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. There shall not be in effect on the Closing Date any Order or Law of any
Governmental or Regulatory Authority of any country restraining, enjoining or otherwise prohibiting or making illegal the consummation of any of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 7.05.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Governmental or Regulatory Approvals</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. All consents, approvals and actions of, filings with and
notices to any Governmental or Regulatory Authority set forth on Section 3.04 of Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule shall have been duly obtained, made or given and shall be in full force and effect. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 7.06.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Resignations</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Seller shall have delivered the resignation letters for all officers and directors
of TEC and of all directors of Electroandes. </FONT></P>
<P align="center">
<B><FONT face="serif">ARTICLE VIII </FONT></B><BR>
<BR>
<B><FONT face="serif">CONDITIONS TO OBLIGATIONS OF SELLER</FONT></B><FONT face="serif"> </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">The obligation of Seller to consummate the transactions described in Section 2.01 are subject to the fulfillment, at or before the Closing, of each of the following conditions (all or any of which may
be waived in writing, in whole or in part by Seller in its sole discretion): </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 8.01.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Representations and Warranties</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. The representations and warranties of Purchaser contained in
this Agreement shall be true and correct in all material respects as of the Closing Date as though such representations and warranties were made on and as of the Closing Date, except to the extent such representations and warranties expressly relate
to an earlier date (in which case as of such earlier date). </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 8.02.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Performance</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Purchaser shall have performed and complied in all material respects with the
agreements, covenants and obligations required by this Agreement to be performed or complied with by Purchaser at or before the Closing. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 8.03.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Officers&#146; Certificates</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Purchaser shall have delivered to Seller a certificate, dated the
Closing Date and executed in the name and on behalf of Purchaser substantially in the form and to the effect of Exhibit E. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 8.04.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Orders and Laws</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. There shall not be in effect on the Closing Date any Order or Law of any
Governmental or Regulatory Authority of any country restraining, enjoining or otherwise prohibiting or making illegal the consummation of any of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=4>



<p style="page-break-before:always"></p><PAGE>


<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 8.05.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Governmental or Regulatory Approvals</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. All consents, approvals and actions of, filings with and
notices to any Governmental or Regulatory Authority of any country necessary to permit Purchaser and Seller to perform their obligations under this Agreement and to consummate the sale of the Interests under this Agreement and the transactions
contemplated hereby shall have been duly obtained, made or given and shall be in full force and effect, and all waiting periods imposed by any Governmental or Regulatory Authority of any country necessary for the consummation of the transactions
contemplated by this Agreement shall have expired. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 8.06.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Third Party Consents</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. The consents (or waivers in lieu thereof) listed in Section 8.06 of
Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule shall have been obtained and shall be in full force and effect. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 8.07.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Government Lists Findings</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Seller shall have determined (in its sole discretion) based on the
information provided under Section 6.04 or otherwise that Purchaser&#146;s sources of funds (or lack of specificity of such sources) will not expose Seller or any of its Affiliates to any violation of any Laws of the Governmental or Regulatory
Authorities of the United States, Bermuda, Peru or the Cayman Islands. </FONT></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 8.08.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">AenP Transfer</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Purchaser shall have executed and delivered to Seller the AenP Transfer of
Interest to Purchaser. </FONT></P>
<P align="center">
<B><FONT face="serif">ARTICLE IX </FONT></B><BR>
<BR>
<B><FONT face="serif">SURVIVAL; DISCLAIMER; NON-RECOURSE; </FONT></B><BR>
<BR>
<B><FONT face="serif">INDEMNITY; TRANSFER TAXES </FONT></B></P>
<P align="left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT face="serif">Section 9.01.</FONT><FONT face="sans-serif"> </FONT><U><FONT face="serif">Survival and Damage Limitations</FONT></U><FONT face="serif">. Without prejudice to Purchaser&#146;s rights under Section
9.11, it is expressly agreed by the parties hereto that (a) the representations and warranties set forth in Sections 3.03(a), 3.04(a), 3.05, 3.06(a), 3.08, 3.10, 3.11, 3.12, 3.13, 3.14, 3.15(a), 3.16 and 3.17 herein (the &#147;Designated
Representations&#148;) shall terminate and be of no further force or effect upon the first anniversary of the Closing Date, (b) the representations and warranties set forth in Section 3.09 shall terminate and be of no further force and effect upon
the Closing, and (c) all other representations and warranties of Seller contained in this Agreement shall survive indefinitely. No breach by Seller of any covenant, agreement or condition of this Agreement shall be deemed to be a breach of this
Agreement for any purpose under this Agreement (other than Section 7.02), and neither Purchaser nor any Affiliate of Purchaser shall have any claim or recourse against Seller or their directors, officers, employees, Affiliates, controlling persons,
